Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is reddish in section, containing many small white and metallic inclusions, the interior bears faint traces of five lines of black-painted demotic text, the exterior is covered with a rough off-white slip, now flaked away in many places, and faint traces of several further lines of black-painted text. Joins to 66319.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393807) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393807)
